ValidationRule.description: Restrict CML Manager profiles (both CAN & US) from being able to transfer accounts owned by “Samsara Small Fleets” into AE ownership
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISCHANGED(OwnerId), OR(PRIORVALUE(Owner_Name__c)= "Samsara Small Fleets", PRIORVALUE(Owner_Name__c)= "SFDC Pool"), OR( AND(CONTAINS($UserRole.DeveloperName, "CML"), CONTAINS($UserRole.DeveloperName, "Manager")), ($UserRole.DeveloperName = "Fleet_IS_NA_US_Team_28_Manager") ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Commercial Managers are not permitted to transfer accounts owned by Samsara Small Fleets or SFDC Pool. Please contact Sales Ops if you have any questions
